title: hakonRlab.github.io
text:
The Oslo model
A lymph node invasion prediction model for prostate cancer patients
Sample size calculations. I have just been doing some testing.

library(pmsampsize)
out <- pmsampsize(type = "b", cstatistic  = 0.8, parameters = 20, prevalence = 0.25, shrinkage = 0.8)
out$results_table

           Samp_size Shrinkage Parameter CS_Rsq Max_Rsq Nag_Rsq  EPP
Criteria 1       334      0.80        20 0.2075   0.675   0.307 4.18
Criteria 2       518      0.86        20 0.2075   0.675   0.307 6.47
Criteria 3       289      0.86        20 0.2075   0.675   0.307 3.61
Final            518      0.86        20 0.2075   0.675   0.307 6.47
